const options = [
    { value: '1', label: '1 Employee' },
    { value: '2-4', label: "2-4 Employee's" },
    { value: '4-7', label: "4-7 Employee's" },
    { value: '8-10', label: "8-10 Employee's" },
    { value: '11-15', label: "11-15 Employee's" },
    { value: '16-20', label: "16-20 Employee's" },
    { value: '21-30', label: "21-30 Employee's" },
    { value: '31-50', label: "31-50 Employee's" },
    { value: '51-100', label: "51-100 Employee's" },
    { value: '101-200', label: "101-200 Employee's" },
    { value: '201-300', label: "201-300 Employee's" },
    { value: '301-400', label: "301-400 Employee's" },
    { value: '401-500', label: "401-500 Employee's" },
    { value: '500+', label: "500+ Employee's" }
];
const yearOptions = [
    { value: '1', label: '1 Year In Business' },
    { value: '2', label: '2 Years In Business' },
    { value: '3', label: '3 Years In Business' },
    { value: '4', label: '4 Years In Business' },
    { value: '5', label: '5 Years In Business' },
    { value: '6', label: '6 Years In Business' },
    { value: '7', label: '7 Years In Business' },
    { value: '8', label: '8 Years In Business' },
    { value: '9', label: '9 Years In Business' },
    { value: '10', label: '10 Years In Business' },
    { value: '11-15', label: '11-15 Years In Business' },
    { value: '16-20', label: '16-20 Years In Business' },
    { value: '21-25', label: '21-25 Years In Business' },
    { value: '26-30', label: '26-30 Years In Business' },
    { value: '31-39', label: '31-39 Years In Business' },
    { value: '40+', label: '40+ Years In Business' }
];
const assets = [
    { label: "External Network Penetration Testing", value: "external-network-penetration-testing" },
    { label: "Internal Network Penetration Testing", value: "internal-network-penetration-testing" },
    { label: "Social Engineering Testing", value: "social-engineering-testing" },
    { label: "Physical Penetration Testing", value: "physical-penetration-testing" },
    { label: "Wireless Penetration Testing", value: "wireless-penetration-testing" },
    { label: "Application Penetration Testing", value: "application-penetration-testing" }
];
export {
    assets,
    yearOptions,
    options
}
